title: Lauryn’s Take On Pregnancy: Routines, Sex, Gaining Weight, Supplements, No Alcohol, & More
itunes:title: Lauryn’s Take On Pregnancy: Routines, Sex, Gaining Weight, Supplements, No Alcohol, & More
description:
#229: On this episode Lauryn is solo discussing her real takes on pregnancy. She dives into her routines, sex life, weight gain, supplements, and life without wine.

Visit www.tscpodcast.com for all the resources mentioned in this episode.
